Question 21) Text I Democratic action is all to take part of the decision -making process about what will have a consequence in the life of the whole community. GALLO, S. et al. Ethics and citizenship. Paths of Philosophy. Text II It is necessary that there is freedom of expression, supervision on government agencies and access by the population to the information brought to the press by the press. Starting from the perspective of democracy presented in text I, the media, according to text II, play a relevant role in society by
A) Guide citizens in the purchase of the goods necessary for their survival and well-being.
B) provide information that fosters political debate in the public sphere.
C) present to citizens the official version of the facts.
D) provide entertainment, relevant aspect for political awareness.
E) promote cultural unity through sports broadcasts.
